Global.unknownError: Njuumte xamul temboo tey am na.
Global.allRightsReserved: Yelleef yépp ñu ngi leen saytu.

LandingPage.subHeading: Sa aparey tele-sañte bu bari-làkk bu AI toppatoo. Am xibaari faj, gis doktoor, jël diggante, ak yeneen – ci Wolof, Faranse, ak Angale.
LandingPage.multilingualSupportDesc: Waxleen ci Wolof, Faranse, mbaa Angale. Sunu jumtukaay defarees nañ ko ngir nga mën cee waxtaane ci ay làkk yu wuute.
LandingPage.aiChatAssistantDesc: Am ay tontu ci laajiy faj jaare ko ci mbind mbaa baat. Sunu AI dafay dégg baat bi, bind ko, teg ca tontu ci baat.
LandingPage.portalsDesc: Saytuleen diggante yi, seet profiil yi, te yégg seeni xibaari wérgi-yaram ci anam bu yomb jaare ko ci ay xët yu ñu leen jagleel.
LandingPage.bridgeTitle: Dindi Kàcc-kàcci Làkk ci Wàllu Faj
LandingPage.bridgeDesc: Xool addina bu gëna wér ak bu gëna booloo.
LandingPage.bridgePara: MediLingua Connect am na coobare ngir jagleel képp ku soxla xibaar ci wàllu wérgi-yaram, fu mu mën ti doon ak làkk wu mu mën ti làkk. Sunu jumtukaay, defar nañu ko ci yërmande te jëfandikoo xarala gu yees ngir mën a toppatoo mbooloo yu bari.
LandingPage.advancedSearchDesc: Wër ay doktoor jaarale ko ci seen spesiyalite, fu ñu nekk (bokk na ci 'fi ma gëna jege'), ak làkk yi ñu làkk.
LandingPage.videoConsultationsDesc: Jokkooleen ak borom xam-xam ci wàllu wérgi-yaram jaare ko ci ay woote widewo yu suturaal ci biir jumtukaay bi.
LandingPage.appointmentSchedulingDesc: Jël, saytu, te fàttaliku say digganteey faj ci anam bu yomb.

FindDoctorPage.title: Wër Doktor
FindDoctorPage.description: Wër ay borom-xamxamu faj yu méngo ak say soxla.
FindDoctorPage.locationPlaceholder: misal: Dëkk, Kóod postal, walla bindal 'fi ma jege'
FindDoctorPage.externalDoctorsTitle: Doktor Yuñu Gis ci Net bi (Similasyon)
FindDoctorPage.noResultsFound: Amul benn doktor bu méngo ak li nga wër. Jémal yaatal say kriteer walla seetal ci ñiñ gis ci biti.
FindDoctorPage.initialSearchPrompt: Jëfandikool fiiltar yi ci kaw ngir gis ay doktor. Limu doktor yi fii lay feeñ. Jémal 'Jëfandikul sama nekkaway' ngir wër ñi la jege.
FindDoctorPage.searchingInNetwork: Mingiy wër ci sunu biir reso...
FindDoctorPage.searchingExternally: Amul benn doktor ci sunu reso. Ceftu gu bitim réew mingiy daw...
FindDoctorPage.tryBroadeningSearch: Amul benn doktor buñ gis ci biti ak kriteer yii. Jémal yaatal sa ceftu.
FindDoctorPage.externalResultsFoundTitle: Ceftu gu Bitim Réew Jeex na
FindDoctorPage.externalResultsDisplayed: Limu doktor yiñ gis ci biti.
FindDoctorPage.internalResultsDisplayed: {count, plural, =1 {# doktor gis nañ ko ci sunu reso.} other {# doktor gis nañ leen ci sunu reso.}}
FindDoctorPage.requestModalDescription: Yónnee laaj {type} bi {doctorName}. Lii mingi ci defar.
FindDoctorPage.invitationSentDescription: Bataaxal ngir woote {doctorName} ci MediLingua Connect yónnees na.
FindDoctorPage.externalSearchFailed: Ceftu doktor bu bitim réew gi antuwul: {error}
FindDoctorPage.locationSuccessDesc: Sa nekkaway bu teew bignuy jëfandiko ngir ceftu gi.

VideoConsultationPage.title: Seetante ci Widewo
VideoConsultationPage.description: Jokkoo ak sa borom xam-xamu wérgu yaram ci anam gu wóor.
VideoConsultationPage.accessRequiredTitle: Sozlon Kámara ak Mikrofon Laaj Nañu
VideoConsultationPage.accessRequiredDescription: Dajalal yelleefu kámara ak mikrofon ci parametari say navigatëer ngir mën jëfandikoo seetante ci widewo. Defareel xët wi ginnaaw bi nga ko dajalee.
VideoConsultationPage.connectedDoctorsOnlyDescription: Jumtukaayu seetante ci widewo bi, dafa jagleel doktor yi nga bokkal jokkoo ci platfòrm bi. Defar gu mat sëkk ci wàllu jokkoo bi mingi ci yoon.
VideoConsultationPage.waitingForParticipant: Mingiy xaar ki ci war a bokk...
VideoConsultationPage.cameraAccessDenied: Yelleefu kámara bi dañ nañ ko.
VideoConsultationPage.uiDemoNote: Note : Ceci est une démonstration de l'interface utilisateur. La fonctionnalité réelle d'appel vidéo (connexion pair-à-pair) et le système de connexion médecin ne sont pas encore implémentés.
VideoConsultationPage.endToEndEncryptionNote: Ngir saytug Xibaari Wérgi-yaram yu Ñu Aar (PHI), wóorul ne seetante ci widewo yi dañuy jëfandikoo kripaaj bu diggante-ak-diggante te lép lu ñu ciy def méngóo ak HIPAA walla àtte yu réew mi tërël ci wàllu suturaalug xibaari wérgi-yaram.

LoginPage.title: Dugg
LoginPage.featureInProgress: Jumtukaayu dugg gi mingi ci defar.

RegisterPage.title: Ubbi Kont
RegisterPage.passwordPlaceholder: Defaral baatu jàll bu dëgër (min. 8 karakter)
RegisterPage.registrationSuccessMessage: Dalal-jàmm! Mën nga xool MediLingua Connect leegi.
RegisterPage.passwordMinLength: Baatu jàll bi war naa am daanaka 8 karakter.
